email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the vessel M/V OCEAN HORIZON available for your shipment of 5000MT of Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston on CIF terms. The vessel has a DWT of 85000 and an LOA of 230m. The laycan is set for October 10-15, 2023. The initial freight quote is USD 75/MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate of USD 75/MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering it to USD 70/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 72/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 72/MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on October 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
Global Charterers
